content: Can you describe the project a bit more?
the background should be all colofurl green, not only an image

The AI assistant began by acknowledging the user's project requirements, asking for a title. The user requested a title generation and subsequently provided preferences for features, including adding animations to menu transitions and integrating customizable character options, to which the AI agreed and confirmed that these elements were being worked on. The AI then presented a list of additional features for consideration, such as including sound effects and creating a leaderboard screen. 

As the conversation progressed, the user specified more elements: adding a nice image of a T-Rex, implementing a colorful background template, and designing a user-friendly main menu. The AI acknowledged these requests and confirmed action on each item. The AI continued to suggest additional features, including customizable color palettes and animated background effects, inviting the user to make choices regarding the design aspects. 

When the user reiterated the request for a T-Rex image and a colorful template, the AI responded affirmatively, indicating it would add these features as well. In summary, the user collaborated with the AI to outline their project requirements, confirming the implementation of various design features and interactive elements for their project.
